{"id": "269522", 
"title": "Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice", 
"description": "Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice", 
"OB": "1. Open the file and go to line 22. Notice that you see 5 joinpoints, but there should only be 3. 
2. Go to line 68. Notice that you see zero joinpoints, but there should be 2 here. 
3. Right click the marker at line 68 and choose 'advises'. Notice that you see all 5 joinpoints instead of just the expected 2.", 
"EB": "1. Open the file and go to line 22. Notice that you see 5 joinpoints, but there should only be 3. 
2. Go to line 68. Notice that you see zero joinpoints, but there should be 2 here. 
3. Right click the marker at line 68 and choose 'advises'. Notice that you see all 5 joinpoints instead of just the expected 2.", 
"SR": ""}
